name: Forklift Safety Label
description: Durable adhesive label indicating forklift safety zones and operator rules

name: Warning Label High Voltage
description: Bright yellow label warning of high-voltage equipment

name: No Smoking Sign
description: PVC-based sign to indicate no smoking zones in warehouses

name: Emergency Exit Sign
description: Glow-in-dark emergency exit sign with directional arrows

name: Fire Extinguisher Label
description: Sticker for identifying fire extinguisher placement

name: Warehouse Traffic Sign
description: Metal sign showing warehouse traffic directions

name: Speed Limit Sign
description: Reflective sign indicating max warehouse vehicle speed

name: Pedestrian Crossing Sign
description: Indicates pedestrian crossing areas inside facilities

name: Load Capacity Label
description: Machine-readable label showing forklift load capacity

name: Maintenance Instruction Label
description: Sticker with routine forklift maintenance instructions

name: First Aid Sign
description: Green sign indicating first aid kit location

name: Fuel Type Label
description: Adhesive label indicating fuel type (diesel, LPG, electric)

name: Battery Charging Station Label
description: Warning label for forklift battery charging zones

name: Hazardous Material Sign
description: Sign indicating hazardous material storage area

name: Helmet Zone Sign
description: Safety sign mandating helmet usage in a zone

name: Oil Change Reminder Label
description: Sticker to remind periodic oil changes on forklifts

name: Spare Parts Identification Label
description: Barcode label for tracking forklift spare parts

name: Restricted Area Sign
description: Indicates restricted zone, access only for authorized personnel

name: Parking Zone Sign
description: Marking for forklift parking areas

name: Temperature Warning Label
description: Label warning about high temperature parts in machinery
